55.eng-name: The Book of Zuhd and Softening of Hearts

hadiths.text: Jundub reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:He who wants to publicise (his deeds), Allah will publicise (his humility), and he who makes a hypocritical display (of his deeds), Allah will make a display of him

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ أَشْرَكَ فِي عَمَلِهِ غَيْرَ اللَّهِ
